title: Vertical Asymptote
text: Determine what x-value makes the inside of the logarithmic functon equal to $$0$$ (when it isn't defined). The x-value will be the value of the vertical asymptote.

title: Vertical Asymptote
text: When $$x=0$$, the inside of the logarithmic functon equal to $$0$$. Therefore, the vertical asymptote is $$x=0$$.
